workExperience.title: AI Intern
workExperience.description:
Personalized Job Matching: Implemented dynamic web scraping with Selenium to provide tailored job
 listings. Applied NLP and machine learning for resume analysis and job recommendations.– Tailored Applications with ATS: Using NLP and large language models to create personalized resumes
 and cover letters based on a custom scoring system. Focused on ethical AI use and user empowerment.
